headline.main: U.S. Top Court Throws Out Ruling Favoring Transgender Student
headline.print_headline: U.S. Top Court Throws Out Ruling Favoring Transgender Student

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday scrapped plans to hear a major transgender rights case and threw out a lower court's ruling in favor of a transgender Virginia student after President Donald Trump rescinded a policy protecting such youths under federal law.
